mnd13:3.2: **Ye kecī**ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ—
mnd13:3.6: te dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatānaṃ aññataraññataraṃ diṭṭhigataṃ gahetvā uggahetvā gaṇhitvā parāmasitvā abhinivisitvā sakāya sakāya diṭṭhiyā vasanti saṃvasanti āvasanti parivasanti.
mnd13:3.7: Yathā agārikā vā gharesu vasanti, sāpattikā vā āpattīsu vasanti, sakilesā vā kilesesu vasanti;
mnd13:4.2: “Sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharanti.
mnd13:4.4: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantīti—
mnd13:5.2: Sabbeva te samaṇabrāhmaṇā nindameva anventi, garahameva anventi, akittimeva anventi;
mnd13:5.3: sabbe ninditāyeva honti, garahitāyeva honti, akittitāyeva hontīti—
mnd13:6.2: Tattha sakāya diṭṭhiyā sakāya khantiyā sakāya ruciyā sakāya laddhiyā pasaṃsaṃ thomanaṃ kittiṃ vaṇṇahārikaṃ labhanti paṭilabhanti upagacchanti vindantīti—
mnd13:10.2: **Appañhi etan**ti appakaṃ etaṃ, omakaṃ etaṃ, thokakaṃ etaṃ, lāmakaṃ etaṃ, chatukkaṃ etaṃ, parittakaṃ etanti—
mnd13:10.4: **Na alaṃ samāyā**ti nālaṃ rāgassa samāya, dosassa samāya, mohassa samāya, kodhassa … upanāhassa … makkhassa … paḷāsassa … issāya … macchariyassa … māyāya … sāṭheyyassa … thambhassa … sārambhassa … mānassa … atimānassa … madassa … pamādassa … sabbakilesānaṃ … sabbaduccaritānaṃ … sabbadarathānaṃ … sabbapariḷāhānaṃ … sabbasantāpānaṃ … sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ samāya upasamāya vūpasamāya nibbānāya paṭinissaggāya paṭipassaddhiyāti—
mnd13:11.2: Diṭṭhikalahassa diṭṭhibhaṇḍanassa diṭṭhiviggahassa diṭṭhivivādassa diṭṭhimedhagassa dve phalāni honti—
mnd13:11.3: jayaparājayo hoti, lābhālābho hoti, yasāyaso hoti, nindāpasaṃso hoti, sukhadukkhaṃ hoti, somanassadomanassaṃ hoti, iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ hoti, anunayapaṭighaṃ hoti, ugghātinigghāti hoti, anurodhavirodho hoti.
mnd13:11.4: Atha vā taṃ kammaṃ nirayasaṃvattanikaṃ, tiracchānayonisaṃvattanikaṃ, pettivisayasaṃvattanikanti brūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti—
mnd13:12.2: **Etampi disvā**ti etaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā passitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā diṭṭhikalahesu diṭṭhibhaṇḍanesu diṭṭhiviggahesu diṭṭhivivādesu diṭṭhimedhagesūti—
mnd13:12.4: **Na vivādayethā**ti na kalahaṃ kareyya, na bhaṇḍanaṃ kareyya, na viggahaṃ kareyya, na vivādaṃ kareyya, na medhagaṃ kareyya, kalahaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ viggahaṃ vivādaṃ medhagaṃ pajaheyya vinodeyya byantiṃ kareyya anabhāvaṃ gameyya, kalahā bhaṇḍanā viggahā vivādā medhagā ārato assa virato paṭivirato nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā vihareyyāti—
mnd13:13.3: Yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
mnd13:13.4: Etaṃ avivādabhūmiṃ khemato tāṇato leṇato saraṇato abhayato accutato amatato nibbānato passanto dakkhanto olokento nijjhāyanto upaparikkhantoti—
mnd13:17.2: **Yā kācī**ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ—
mnd13:17.6: **Puthujjā**ti puthujjanehi janitā sammutiyoti puthujjā, puthu nānājanehi janitā vā sammutiyoti puthujjāti—
mnd13:18.3: Sabbāva etā diṭṭhisammutiyo neti na upeti na upagacchati na gaṇhāti na parāmasati nābhinivisatīti—
mnd13:19.7: taṇhūpayassa pahīnattā, diṭṭhūpayassa paṭinissaṭṭhattā anūpayo puggalo kiṃ rūpaṃ upeyya upagaccheyya gaṇheyya parāmaseyya abhiniveseyya attā meti.
mnd13:19.17: kiṃ vaṭṭaṃ upeyya upagaccheyya gaṇheyya parāmaseyya abhiniveseyyāti—
mnd13:20.2: Diṭṭhe vā diṭṭhasuddhiyā vā sute vā sutasuddhiyā vā mute vā mutasuddhiyā vā khantiṃ akubbamāno chandaṃ akubbamāno pemaṃ akubbamāno rāgaṃ akubbamāno ajanayamāno asañjanayamāno anibbattayamāno anabhinibbattayamānoti—
mnd13:24.3: te sīlamattena saññamamattena saṃvaramattena avītikkamamattena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parivisuddhiṃ, muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parivimuttiṃ āhaṃsu vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharanti.
mnd13:25.2: “catūhi kho ahaṃ, gahapati, dhammehi samannāgataṃ purisapuggalaṃ paññapemi sampannakusalaṃ paramakusalaṃ uttamapattipattaṃ samaṇaṃ ayojjhaṃ.
mnd13:25.4: Idha, gahapati, na kāyena pāpakammaṃ karoti, na pāpikaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, na pāpakaṃ saṅkappaṃ saṅkappeti, na pāpakaṃ ājīvaṃ ājīvati.
mnd13:25.5: Imehi kho ahaṃ, gahapati, catūhi dhammehi samannāgataṃ purisapuggalaṃ paññapemi sampannakusalaṃ paramakusalaṃ uttamapattipattaṃ samaṇaṃ ayojjhaṃ;
mnd13:25.7: te sīlamattena saññamamattena saṃvaramattena avītikkamamattena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ, muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ āhaṃsu vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantī”ti—
mnd13:26.2: **Vatan**ti hatthivataṃ vā assavataṃ vā govataṃ vā kukkuravataṃ vā kākavataṃ vā vāsudevavataṃ vā baladevavataṃ vā puṇṇabhaddavataṃ vā maṇibhaddavataṃ vā aggivataṃ vā nāgavataṃ vā supaṇṇavataṃ vā yakkhavataṃ vā asuravataṃ vā gandhabbavataṃ vā mahārājavataṃ vā candavataṃ vā sūriyavataṃ vā indavataṃ vā brahmavataṃ vā devavataṃ vā disāvataṃ vā ādāya samādāya ādiyitvā samādiyitvā gaṇhitvā parāmasitvā abhinivisitvā upaṭṭhitā paccupaṭṭhitā allīnā upagatā ajjhositā adhimuttāti—
mnd13:27.2: **Idhā**ti sakāya diṭṭhiyā sakāya khantiyā sakāya ruciyā sakāya laddhiyā.
mnd13:27.5: **Athassa suddhin**ti athassa suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ, muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttinti—
mnd13:28.4: **Kusalāvadānā**ti kusalavādā paṇḍitavādā thiravādā ñāyavādā hetuvādā lakkhaṇavādā kāraṇavādā ṭhānavādā sakāya laddhiyāti—
mnd13:32.3: paravicchindanāya vā cavati, anabhisambhuṇanto vā cavati.
mnd13:32.5: Paro vicchindati so satthā na sabbaññū, dhammo na svākkhāto, gaṇo na suppaṭipanno, diṭṭhi na bhaddikā, paṭipadā na supaññattā, maggo na niyyāniko, natthettha suddhi vā visuddhi vā parisuddhi vā, mutti vā vimutti vā parimutti vā, natthettha sujjhanti vā visujjhanti vā parisujjhanti vā, muccanti vā vimuccanti vā, parimuccanti vā, hīnā nihīnā omakā lāmakā chatukkā parittāti.
mnd13:32.7: Evaṃ vicchindiyamāno satthārā cavati, dhammakkhānā cavati, gaṇā cavati, diṭṭhiyā cavati, paṭipadāya cavati, maggato cavati.
mnd13:32.10: Sīlaṃ anabhisambhuṇanto sīlato cavati, vataṃ anabhisambhuṇanto vatato cavati, sīlabbataṃ anabhisambhuṇanto sīlabbatato cavati.
mnd13:33.2: **Pavedhatī**ti sīlaṃ vā vataṃ vā sīlabbataṃ vā “viraddhaṃ mayā, aparaddhaṃ mayā, khalitaṃ mayā, galitaṃ mayā, aññāya aparaddho ahan”ti vedhati pavedhati sampavedhatīti—
mnd13:33.4: **Kamma virādhayitvā**ti puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ vā apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ vā āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṃ vā “viraddhaṃ mayā, aparaddhaṃ mayā, khalitaṃ mayā, galitaṃ mayā, aññāya aparaddho ahan”ti vedhati pavedhati sampavedhatīti—
mnd13:34.2: **Pajappatī**ti sīlaṃ vā jappati, vataṃ vā jappati, sīlabbataṃ vā jappati pajappati abhijappatīti—
mnd13:34.4: **Patthayatī ca suddhin**ti sīlasuddhiṃ vā pattheti, vatasuddhiṃ vā pattheti, sīlabbatasuddhiṃ vā pattheti piheti abhijappatīti—
mnd13:35.2: Yathā puriso gharato nikkhanto satthena pavasaṃ vasanto satthā ohīno, taṃ vā satthaṃ anubandhati sakaṃ vā gharaṃ paccāgacchati;
mnd13:35.3: evamevaṃ so diṭṭhigatiko taṃ vā satthāraṃ gaṇhāti aññaṃ vā satthāraṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ vā dhammakkhānaṃ gaṇhāti aññaṃ vā dhammakkhānaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ vā gaṇaṃ gaṇhāti aññaṃ vā gaṇaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ vā diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti aññaṃ vā diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ vā paṭipadaṃ gaṇhāti aññaṃ vā paṭipadaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ vā maggaṃ gaṇhāti aññaṃ vā maggaṃ gaṇhāti parāmasati abhinivisatīti—
mnd13:39.2: Sabbā sīlasuddhiyo pahāya pajahitvā vinodetvā byantiṃ karitvā anabhāvaṃ gametvā, sabbā vatasuddhiyo pahāya pajahitvā vinodetvā byantiṃ karitvā anabhāvaṃ gametvā, sabbā sīlabbatasuddhiyo pahāya pajahitvā vinodetvā byantiṃ karitvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti—
mnd13:40.6: Sāvajjañca kammaṃ anavajjañca kammaṃ pahāya pajahitvā vinodetvā byantiṃ karitvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti—
mnd13:41.4: asuddhiṃ patthenti, akusale dhamme patthenti, pañca kāmaguṇe patthenti;
mnd13:41.5: suddhiṃ patthenti, dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni patthenti, asuddhiṃ patthenti, akusale dhamme patthenti, pañca kāmaguṇe patthenti, dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni patthenti;
mnd13:41.7: tedhātuke kusale dhamme patthenti, asuddhiṃ patthenti, akusale dhamme patthenti, pañca kāmaguṇe patthenti, dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni patthenti, tedhātuke kusale dhamme patthenti;
mnd13:41.10: Arahatte patte arahā neva akusale dhamme pattheti, napi pañca kāmaguṇe pattheti, napi dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni pattheti, napi tedhātuke kusale dhamme pattheti, napi niyāmāvakkantiṃ pattheti, napi aggadhammaṃ arahattaṃ pattheti.
mnd13:42.2: **Virato**ti suddhiasuddhiyā ārato assa virato paṭivirato nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto, vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
mnd13:42.4: **Care**ti careyya vicareyya vihareyya iriyeyya vatteyya pāleyya yapeyya yāpeyyāti—
mnd13:42.7: Santiyo vuccanti dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni diṭṭhisantiyo agaṇhanto aparāmasanto anabhinivisantoti—
mnd13:45.2: **Atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā;**
mnd13:46.2: Santeke samaṇabrāhmaṇā tapojigucchavādā tapojigucchasārā tapojigucchanissitā ānissitā allīnā upagatā ajjhositā adhimuttāti—
mnd13:47.1: **Atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā**ti.
mnd13:47.2: Diṭṭhaṃ vā diṭṭhasuddhiṃ vā sutaṃ vā sutasuddhiṃ vā mutaṃ vā mutasuddhiṃ vā nissāya upanissāya gaṇhitvā parāmasitvā abhinivisitvāti—
mnd13:47.3: atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā.
mnd13:48.4: Ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā accantasuddhikā, saṃsārasuddhikā, akiriyadiṭṭhikā, sassatavādā—
mnd13:48.6: Te saṃsāre suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ, muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ thunanti vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantīti—
mnd13:49.2: **Taṇhā**ti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā.
mnd13:49.3: **Bhavābhavesū**ti bhavābhave kammabhave punabbhave kāmabhave, kammabhave kāmabhave punabbhave rūpabhave, kammabhave rūpabhave punabbhave arūpabhave, kammabhave arūpabhave punabbhave punappunabbhave punappunagatiyā punappunaupapattiyā punappunapaṭisandhiyā punappunaattabhāvābhinibbattiyā avītataṇhā avigatataṇhā acattataṇhā avantataṇhā amuttataṇhā appahīnataṇhā appaṭinissaṭṭhataṇhāti—
mnd13:51.2: Atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā;
mnd13:53.3: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
mnd13:53.8: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlanti—
mnd13:54.7: Pakappitaṃ vatthuṃ acchedasaṅkinopi vedhenti, acchijjantepi vedhenti, acchinnepi vedhenti;
mnd13:54.8: pakappitaṃ vatthuṃ vipariṇāmasaṅkinopi vedhenti, vipariṇamantepi vedhenti, vipariṇatepi vedhenti pavedhenti sampavedhentīti—
mnd13:55.3: Yassa gamanaṃ āgamanaṃ gamanāgamanaṃ kālaṃ gati bhavābhavo cuti ca upapatti ca nibbatti ca bhedo ca jāti ca jarāmaraṇañca natthi na santi na saṃvijjanti nupalabbhanti, pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti—
mnd13:56.2: So kena rāgena vedheyya, kena dosena vedheyya, kena mohena vedheyya, kena mānena vedheyya, kāya diṭṭhiyā vedheyya, kena uddhaccena vedheyya, kāya vicikicchāya vedheyya, kehi anusayehi vedheyya—
mnd13:56.3: rattoti vā duṭṭhoti vā mūḷhoti vā vinibaddhoti vā parāmaṭṭhoti vā vikkhepagatoti vā aniṭṭhaṅgatoti vā thāmagatoti vā.
mnd13:56.6: nerayikoti vā tiracchānayonikoti vā pettivisayikoti vā manussoti vā devoti vā rūpīti vā arūpīti vā saññīti vā asaññīti vā nevasaññīnāsaññīti vā, so hetu natthi paccayo natthi kāraṇaṃ natthi yena vedheyya pavedheyya sampavedheyyāti—
mnd13:56.8: **Kuhiṃva jappe**ti kuhiṃ vā jappeyya kimhi jappeyya, kattha jappeyya pajappeyya abhijappeyyāti—
mnd13:56.9: sa kena vedheyya kuhiṃ va jappe.
mnd13:58.4: Sa kena vedheyya kuhiṃ va jappe”ti.
mnd13:60.2: Yaṃ dhammaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭipadaṃ maggaṃ eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā “idaṃ paramaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaran”ti, evamāhaṃsu evaṃ kathenti evaṃ bhaṇanti evaṃ dīpayanti evaṃ voharantīti—
mnd13:61.1: **Tameva hīnanti panāhu aññe**ti tameva dhammaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭipadaṃ maggaṃ eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā “hīnaṃ etaṃ, nihīnaṃ etaṃ, omakaṃ etaṃ, lāmakaṃ etaṃ, chatukkaṃ etaṃ, parittakaṃ etan”ti, evamāhaṃsu evaṃ kathenti evaṃ bhaṇanti evaṃ dīpayanti evaṃ voharantīti—
mnd13:62.2: Imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vādo katamo sacco taccho tatho bhūto yāthāvo aviparītoti—
mnd13:63.2: Sabbevime samaṇabrāhmaṇā kusalavādā paṇḍitavādā thiravādā ñāyavādā hetuvādā lakkhaṇavādā kāraṇavādā ṭhānavādā sakāya laddhiyāti—
mnd13:67.1: **Sakañhi dhammaṃ paripuṇṇamāhū**ti sakaṃ dhammaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭipadaṃ maggaṃ eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā “idaṃ samattaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ anoman”ti, evamāhaṃsu …pe…
mnd13:68.2: Aññassa dhammaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭipadaṃ maggaṃ eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā “hīnaṃ etaṃ, nihīnaṃ etaṃ, omakaṃ etaṃ, lāmakaṃ etaṃ, chatukkaṃ etaṃ, parittakaṃ etan”ti, evamāhaṃsu evaṃ kathenti evaṃ bhaṇanti evaṃ dīpayanti evaṃ voharantīti—
mnd13:69.1: **Evampi viggayha vivādayantī**ti evaṃ gahetvā uggahetvā gaṇhitvā parāmasitvā abhinivisitvā vivādayanti, kalahaṃ karonti, bhaṇḍanaṃ karonti, viggahaṃ karonti, vivādaṃ karonti, medhagaṃ karonti—
mnd13:70.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti—
mnd13:74.1: **Parassa ce vambhayitena hīno**ti parassa ce vambhayitakāraṇā ninditakāraṇā garahitakāraṇā upavaditakāraṇā paro bālo hoti hīno nihīno omako lāmako chatukko parittoti—
mnd13:75.2: Dhammesu na koci aggo seṭṭho visiṭṭho pāmokkho uttamo pavaro assāti—
mnd13:76.2: Bahukāpi bahūnaṃ dhammaṃ vadanti upavadanti nindanti garahanti hīnato nihīnato omakato lāmakato chatukkato parittato, bahukāpi ekassa dhammaṃ vadanti upavadanti nindanti garahanti hīnato nihīnato omakato lāmakato chatukkato parittato, ekopi bahūnaṃ dhammaṃ vadati upavadati nindati garahati hīnato nihīnato omakato lāmakato chatukkato parittato, ekopi ekassa dhammaṃ vadati upavadati nindati garahati hīnato nihīnato omakato lāmakato chatukkato parittatoti—
mnd13:77.2: Dhammo sakāyanaṃ, diṭṭhi sakāyanaṃ, paṭipadā sakāyanaṃ, maggo sakāyanaṃ, sakāyane daḷhavādā thiravādā balikavādā aṭṭhitavādāti—
mnd13:81.3: Sakaṃ satthāraṃ sakkaroti garuṃ karoti māneti pūjeti “ayaṃ satthā sabbaññū”ti—
mnd13:81.5: Sakaṃ dhammakkhānaṃ sakaṃ gaṇaṃ sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ sakaṃ paṭipadaṃ sakaṃ maggaṃ sakkaroti garuṃ karoti māneti pūjeti “ayaṃ maggo niyyāniko”ti—
mnd13:81.7: **Saddhammapūjāpi nesaṃ tathevā**ti saddhammapūjā tathā tacchā bhūtā yāthāvā aviparītāti—
mnd13:82.2: Dhammo sakāyanaṃ diṭṭhi sakāyanaṃ paṭipadā sakāyanaṃ maggo sakāyanaṃ, sakāyanāni pasaṃsanti thomenti kittenti vaṇṇentīti—
mnd13:83.1: **Sabbeva vādā tathiyā bhaveyyun**ti sabbeva vādā tathā tacchā bhūtā yāthāvā aviparītā bhaveyyunti—
mnd13:84.2: Paccattameva tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ suddhi visuddhi parisuddhi, mutti vimutti parimuttīti—
mnd13:88.3: **Brāhmaṇo**ti sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo …pe… asito tādi pavuccate sa brahmā.
mnd13:88.4: **Na brāhmaṇassa paraneyyamatthī**ti brāhmaṇassa paraneyyatā natthi, brāhmaṇo na paraneyyo, na parapattiyo, na parapaccayo, na parapaṭibaddhagū jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajāno paṭissato.
mnd13:88.5: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti brāhmaṇassa paraneyyatā natthi, brāhmaṇo na paraneyyo, na parapattiyo, na parapaccayo, na parapaṭibaddhagū jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajāno paṭissato.
mnd13:88.7: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti brāhmaṇassa paraneyyatā natthi, brāhmaṇo na paraneyyo, na parapattiyo, na parapaccayo, na parapaṭibaddhagū jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajāno paṭissatoti—
mnd13:89.3: **Niccheyyā**ti nicchinitvā vinicchinitvā vicinitvā pavicinitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.
mnd13:89.4: **Samuggahītan**ti odhiggāho bilaggāho varaggāho koṭṭhāsaggāho uccayaggāho samuccayaggāho “idaṃ saccaṃ tathaṃ bhūtaṃ yāthāvaṃ aviparītan”ti gahitaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ abhiniviṭṭhaṃ ajjhositaṃ adhimuttaṃ natthi na santi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati, pahīnaṃ samucchinnaṃ vūpasantaṃ paṭipassaddhaṃ abhabbuppattikaṃ ñāṇagginā daḍḍhanti—
mnd13:90.2: **Tasmā**ti tasmā taṃkāraṇā taṃhetu tappaccayā taṃnidānā diṭṭhikalahāni diṭṭhibhaṇḍanāni diṭṭhiviggahāni diṭṭhivivādāni diṭṭhimedhagāni upātivatto atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti—
mnd13:91.2: Aññaṃ satthāraṃ dhammakkhānaṃ gaṇaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭipadaṃ maggaṃ aññatra satipaṭṭhānehi, aññatra sammappadhānehi, aññatra iddhipādehi, aññatra indriyehi, aññatra balehi, aññatra bojjhaṅgehi, aññatra ariyā aṭṭhaṅgikā maggā, aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ dhammaṃ na passati na dakkhati na oloketi na nijjhāyati na upaparikkhatīti—
mnd13:95.2: **Jānāmī**ti paracittañāṇena vā jānāmi, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena vā jānāmi.
mnd13:95.3: **Passāmī**ti maṃsacakkhunā vā passāmi, dibbena cakkhunā vā passāmi.
mnd13:95.4: **Tatheva etan**ti etaṃ tathaṃ tacchaṃ bhūtaṃ yāthāvaṃ aviparītanti—
mnd13:96.2: Diṭṭhiyā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ, muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ paccenti.
mnd13:96.3: “Sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti diṭṭhiyā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ, muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ paccenti.
mnd13:96.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti diṭṭhiyā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ, muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ paccentīti—
mnd13:97.2: **Adakkhī**ti paracittañāṇena vā adakkhi, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena vā adakkhi, maṃsacakkhunā vā adakkhi, dibbena cakkhunā vā adakkhīti—
mnd13:97.6: Na dukkhapariññā atthi, na samudayassa pahānaṃ atthi, na maggabhāvanā atthi, na phalasacchikiriyā atthi, na rāgassa samucchedapahānaṃ atthi, na dosassa samucchedapahānaṃ atthi, na mohassa samucchedapahānaṃ atthi, na kilesānaṃ samucchedapahānaṃ atthi, na saṃsāravaṭṭassa upacchedo atthīti—
mnd13:98.1: **Atisitvā aññena vadanti suddhin**ti te titthiyā suddhimaggaṃ visuddhimaggaṃ parisuddhimaggaṃ vodātamaggaṃ parivodātamaggaṃ atikkamitvā samatikkamitvā vītivattitvā aññatra satipaṭṭhānehi, aññatra sammappadhānehi, aññatra iddhipādehi, aññatra indriyehi, aññatra balehi, aññatra bojjhaṅgehi, aññatra ariyā aṭṭhaṅgikā maggā suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ, muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantīti.
mnd13:99.1: Atha vā buddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca paccekabuddhā ca tesaṃ titthiyānaṃ asuddhimaggaṃ avisuddhimaggaṃ aparisuddhimaggaṃ avodātamaggaṃ aparivodātamaggaṃ atikkamitvā samatikkamitvā vītivattitvā catūhi satipaṭṭhānehi catūhi sammappadhānehi catūhi iddhipādehi pañcahi indriyehi pañcahi balehi sattahi bojjhaṅgehi ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ, muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantīti—
mnd13:103.1: **Passaṃ naro dakkhati nāmarūpan**ti passaṃ naro dakkhati paracittañāṇena vā passanto, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena vā passanto, maṃsacakkhunā vā passanto, dibbena cakkhunā vā passanto nāmarūpaṃyeva dakkhati niccato sukhato attato, na tesaṃ dhammānaṃ samudayaṃ vā atthaṅgamaṃ vā assādaṃ vā ādīnavaṃ vā nissaraṇaṃ vā dakkhatīti—
mnd13:104.2: **Disvā**ti paracittañāṇena vā disvā, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena vā disvā, maṃsacakkhunā vā disvā, dibbena cakkhunā vā disvā, nāmarūpaṃyeva disvā ñassati niccato sukhato attato, na tesaṃ dhammānaṃ samudayaṃ vā atthaṅgamaṃ vā assādaṃ vā ādīnavaṃ vā nissaraṇaṃ vā ñassatīti—
mnd13:105.2: Kāmaṃ bahukaṃ vā passanto nāmarūpaṃ appakaṃ vā niccato sukhato attatoti—
mnd13:106.2: **Kusalā**ti ye te khandhakusalā dhātukusalā āyatanakusalā paṭiccasamuppādakusalā satipaṭṭhānakusalā sammappadhānakusalā iddhipādakusalā indriyakusalā balakusalā bojjhaṅgakusalā maggakusalā phalakusalā nibbānakusalā, te kusalā paracittañāṇena vā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena vā maṃsacakkhunā vā dibbena cakkhunā vā nāmarūpadassanena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ na vadanti na kathenti na bhaṇanti na dīpayanti na voharantīti—
mnd13:106.3: na hi tena suddhiṃ kusalā vadanti.
mnd13:108.4: Na hi tena suddhiṃ kusalā vadantī”ti.
mnd13:110.4: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti—
mnd13:110.7: Nivissavādī dubbinayo duppaññāpayo dunnijjhāpayo duppekkhāpayo duppasādayoti—
mnd13:111.2: Kappitā pakappitā abhisaṅkhatā saṇṭhapitā diṭṭhiṃ purekkhato katvā carati.
mnd13:111.3: Diṭṭhidhajo diṭṭhiketu diṭṭhādhipateyyo diṭṭhiyā parivārito caratīti—
mnd13:112.2: **Yaṃ nissito**ti yaṃ satthāraṃ dhammakkhānaṃ gaṇaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭipadaṃ maggaṃ nissito ānissito allīno upagato ajjhosito adhimuttoti—
mnd13:112.4: **Tatthā**ti sakāya diṭṭhiyā sakāya khantiyā sakāya ruciyā sakāya laddhiyā.
mnd13:112.5: **Subhaṃ vadāno**ti subhavādo sobhanavādo paṇḍitavādo thiravādo ñāyavādo hetuvādo lakkhaṇavādo kāraṇavādo ṭhānavādo sakāya laddhiyāti—
mnd13:113.3: Atha vā suddhidassano visuddhidassano parisuddhidassano vodātadassano parivodātadassanoti—
mnd13:113.5: **Tatthā**ti sakāya diṭṭhiyā sakāya khantiyā sakāya ruciyā sakāya laddhiyā tathaṃ tacchaṃ bhūtaṃ yāthāvaṃ aviparītanti addassa adakkhi apassi paṭivijjhīti—
mnd13:117.3: **Brāhmaṇo**ti sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo …pe… asito tādi pavuccate sa brahmā.
mnd13:117.9: Yā paññā pajānanā …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.
mnd13:117.11: Brāhmaṇo saṅkhāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.
mnd13:117.14: yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti saṅkhāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā taṇhākappaṃ vā diṭṭhikappaṃ vā neti na upeti na upagacchati na gaṇhāti na parāmasati nābhinivisatīti—
mnd13:118.2: Tassa dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭipassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni.
mnd13:118.3: So diṭṭhiyā na yāyati na nīyati na vuyhati na saṃharīyati napi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ sārato pacceti na paccāgacchatīti—
mnd13:118.5: **Napi ñāṇabandhū**ti aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā taṇhābandhuṃ vā diṭṭhibandhuṃ vā na karoti na janeti na sañjaneti na nibbatteti nābhinibbattetīti—
mnd13:119.2: **Ñatvā**ti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.
mnd13:119.3: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā,
mnd13:119.5: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti—
mnd13:119.10: Puthu nānājanehi janitā vā sammutiyoti puthujjāti—
mnd13:120.2: Aññe taṇhāvasena diṭṭhivasena gaṇhanti parāmasanti abhinivisanti.
mnd13:120.3: Arahā upekkhati na gaṇhāti na parāmasati nābhinivisatīti—
mnd13:124.3: abhijjhā kāyagantho, byāpādo kāyagantho, sīlabbataparāmāso kāyagantho, idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho.
mnd13:124.4: Attano diṭṭhiyā rāgo abhijjhā kāyagantho, paravādesu āghāto appaccayo byāpādo kāyagantho, attano sīlaṃ vā vataṃ vā sīlabbataṃ vā parāmasati sīlabbataparāmāso kāyagantho, attano diṭṭhi idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho.
mnd13:124.6: Atha vā ganthe gathite ganthite bandhe vibandhe ābandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane phoṭayitvā vissajja.
mnd13:124.7: Yathā vayhaṃ vā rathaṃ vā sakaṭaṃ vā sandamānikaṃ vā sajjaṃ vissajjaṃ karonti vikopenti;
mnd13:124.9: Atha vā ganthe gathite gaṇṭhite bandhe vibandhe ābandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane phoṭayitvā vissajja.
mnd13:125.2: Vivādajātesu sañjātesu nibbattesu abhinibbattesu pātubhūtesu chandāgatiṃ gacchantesu dosāgatiṃ gacchantesu bhayāgatiṃ gacchantesu mohāgatiṃ gacchantesu na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ gacchati, na bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ gacchati, na rāgavasena gacchati, na dosavasena gacchati, na mohavasena gacchati, na mānavasena gacchati, na diṭṭhivasena gacchati, na uddhaccavasena gacchati, na vicikicchāvasena gacchati, na anusayavasena gacchati, na vaggehi dhammehi yāyati nīyati vuyhati saṃharīyatīti—
mnd13:126.2: **Santo**ti rāgassa santattā santo, dosassa santattā santo, mohassa santattā santo …pe… sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ santattā samitattā vūpasamitattā vijjhātattā nibbutattā vigatattā paṭipassaddhattā santo upasanto vūpasanto nibbuto paṭipassaddhoti—
mnd13:126.6: **Upekkhako so**ti arahā chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgato cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
mnd13:127.2: Aññe taṇhāvasena diṭṭhivasena gaṇhante parāmasante abhinivisante.
mnd13:127.3: Arahā upekkhati na gaṇhāti na parāmasati nābhinivisatīti—
mnd13:131.3: Atīte saṅkhāre ārabbha ye kilesā uppajjeyyuṃ te kilese hitvā cajitvā pariccajitvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantiṃ karitvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti—
mnd13:131.6: Paccuppanne saṅkhāre ārabbha chandaṃ akubbamāno pemaṃ akubbamāno rāgaṃ akubbamāno ajanayamāno asañjanayamāno anibbattayamāno anabhinibbattayamānoti—
mnd13:132.2: Na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ gacchati, na bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, na rāgavasena gacchati, na dosavasena gacchati, na mohavasena gacchati, na mānavasena gacchati, na diṭṭhivasena gacchati, na uddhaccavasena gacchati, na vicikicchāvasena gacchati, na anusayavasena gacchati, na vaggehi dhammehi yāyati nīyati vuyhati na saṃharīyatīti—
mnd13:132.4: **Nopi nivissavādī**ti “sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti na nivissavādī …pe…
mnd13:132.5: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti na nivissavādīti—
mnd13:133.1: **Sa vippamutto diṭṭhigatehi dhīro**ti tassa dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭipassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni.
mnd13:133.2: So diṭṭhigatehi vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharati.
mnd13:133.3: **Dhīro**ti dhīro paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvīti—
mnd13:134.7: tassa taṇhālepassa pahīnattā, diṭṭhilepassa paṭinissaṭṭhattā apāyaloke na limpati, manussaloke na limpati, devaloke na limpati, khandhaloke na limpati, dhātuloke na limpati, āyatanaloke na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati, alitto apalitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
mnd13:135.3: Kathaṃ katattā ca akatattā ca attānaṃ garahati?
mnd13:135.4: “Kataṃ me kāyaduccaritaṃ, akataṃ me kāyasucaritan”ti attānaṃ garahati.
mnd13:135.8: katā me micchādiṭṭhi, akatā me sammādiṭṭhī”ti attānaṃ garahati.
mnd13:135.9: Evaṃ katattā ca akatattā ca attānaṃ garahati.
mnd13:136.1: Atha vā “sīlesumhi na paripūrakārī”ti attānaṃ garahati.
mnd13:136.17: Evaṃ katattā ca akatattā ca attānaṃ garahati.
mnd13:136.19: Tayidaṃ kammaṃ akubbamāno ajanayamāno asañjanayamāno anibbattayamāno anabhinibbattayamāno anattagarahīti—
mnd13:139.2: **Yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā;**
mnd13:140.1: **Sa sabbadhammesu visenibhūto yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā**ti.
mnd13:140.3: Kāyaduccaritaṃ mārasenā, vacīduccaritaṃ mārasenā, manoduccaritaṃ mārasenā, rāgo … doso … moho … kodho … upanāho … makkho … paḷāso … issā … macchariyaṃ … māyā … sāṭheyyaṃ … thambho … sārambho … māno … atimāno … mado … pamādo … sabbe kilesā … sabbe duccaritā … sabbe darathā … sabbe pariḷāhā … sabbe santāpā … sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā mārasenā.
mnd13:143.1: Yato catūhi ariyamaggehi sabbā ca mārasenā sabbe ca paṭisenikarā kilesā jitā ca parājitā ca bhaggā vippaluggā parammukhā—
mnd13:143.7: sa sabbadhammesu visenibhūto, yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā.
mnd13:144.5: Paṭisandhiyā rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ—
mnd13:144.14: Yato khandhabhāro ca kilesabhāro ca abhisaṅkhārabhāro ca pahīnā honti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā, so vuccati pannabhāro patitabhāro oropitabhāro samoropitabhāro nikkhittabhāro paṭipassaddhabhāro.
mnd13:145.2: Yā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā, paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūri medhā parināyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṃ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.
mnd13:146.4: Tividhānaṃ kāyaduccaritānaṃ pahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, tividhaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyapariññā kāyamoneyyaṃ, pariññāsahagato maggo kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāye chandarāgassa pahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyasaṅkhāranirodho catutthajjhānasamāpatti kāyamoneyyaṃ—
mnd13:147.2: Catubbidhānaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ pahānaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ, catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ, vācārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ, vācāpariññā vacīmoneyyaṃ, pariññāsahagato maggo vacīmoneyyaṃ, vācāya chandarāgassa pahānaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ, vacīsaṅkhāranirodho dutiyajjhānasamāpatti vacīmoneyyaṃ—
mnd13:148.2: Tividhānaṃ manoduccaritānaṃ pahānaṃ manomoneyyaṃ, tividhaṃ manosucaritaṃ manomoneyyaṃ, cittārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ manomoneyyaṃ, cittapariññā manomoneyyaṃ, pariññāsahagato maggo manomoneyyaṃ, citte chandarāgassa pahānaṃ manomoneyyaṃ, cittasaṅkhāranirodho saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti manomoneyyaṃ—
mnd13:151.1: Imehi tīhi moneyyehi dhammehi samannāgatā cha munino—
mnd13:151.2: agāramunino, anagāramunino, sekhamunino, asekhamunino, paccekamunino, munimuninoti.
mnd13:155.1: **Vippamutto**ti munino rāgā cittaṃ muttaṃ vimuttaṃ suvimuttaṃ;
mnd13:156.7: taṇhākappassa pahīnattā diṭṭhikappassa paṭinissaṭṭhattā taṇhākappaṃ vā diṭṭhikappaṃ vā na kappeti na janeti na sañjaneti na nibbatteti nābhinibbattetīti—
mnd13:156.10: Sabbe bālaputhujjanā rajjanti, puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ upādāya satta sekhā appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya āramanti viramanti paṭiviramanti, arahā ārato virato paṭivirato nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
mnd13:156.14: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
mnd13:156.15: Yassesā patthanā taṇhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati na patthiyo.
mnd13:157.12: bhaji vā bhagavā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppānīti bhagavā,
mnd13:157.14: bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa adhisīlassa adhicittassa adhipaññāyāti bhagavā,
mnd13:157.15: bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ catunnaṃ appamaññānaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnanti bhagavā,
mnd13:157.16: bhāgī vā bhagavā aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ navannaṃ anupubbavihārasamāpattīnanti bhagavā,
mnd13:157.17: bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ saññābhāvanānaṃ dasannaṃ kasiṇasamāpattīnaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhissa asubhasamāpattiyāti bhagavā,
mnd13:157.18: bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ pañcannaṃ balānaṃ sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassāti bhagavā,
mnd13:157.19: bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ tathāgatabalānaṃ catunnaṃ vesārajjānaṃ catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ channaṃ abhiññānaṃ channaṃ buddhadhammānanti bhagavā,
mnd13:157.20: bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ na pitarā kataṃ na bhātarā kataṃ na bhaginiyā kataṃ na mittāmaccehi kataṃ na ñātisālohitehi kataṃ na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṃ na devatāhi kataṃ;
mnd13:157.21: vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ bhagavāti—
mnd13:157.22: na kappiyo nūparato na patthiyo iti bhagavā.
mnd13:159.2: Yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā;
